title: Tie Dyed Shop Green Grateful Dead Celtic Knot Tie Dye Tshirt
features: Material: Made from 100% heavy weight cotton (6.1 oz). This item will hold shape over time. No more drooping necklines.
Care: Will last a long time with cold water washings.
Fit: Full cut; pre-shrunk; most men should order 1 size larger for a loose fit.
Origin: 100% hand tied and dyed in the USA.
Notes: This item uses cotton stitching which also absorbs the dye (not nylon stitching). The cotton stitching gives a clean blended look rather than a white nylon stitching look.
description: The Grateful Dead Celtic Knot tie dye t shirt is dyed and screen printed in fun detail on the front and back. This vintage t-shirt is available for men, women, teens, and kids in all adult regular (s, m, l, xl) and plus sizes (2x, 3x, 4x, 5x). The small size tee shirt will fit some pre-teen girls and boys. A perfect clothing gift for a Deadhead forever friend of just for you. Officially licensed and made in the USA. Buy this shirt and bring back the Jerry Garcia memories as he led the concert band in cities across the US (Rochester, Chicago, Philadelphia, the Filmore in California, Oakland, and more) and countries in Europe and Africa such as Egypt and Lithuania.
